00002 #define WORKER_H

00014 template <class VertexT, class AggregatorT = DummyAgg> //user-defined VertexT
00015 class Worker {
00016     typedef vector<VertexT*> VertexContainer;
00017     typedef typename VertexContainer::iterator VertexIter;
00018 
00019     typedef typename VertexT::KeyType KeyT;
00020     typedef typename VertexT::MessageType MessageT;
00021     typedef typename VertexT::HashType HashT;
00022 
00023     typedef MessageBuffer<VertexT> MessageBufT;
00024     typedef typename MessageBufT::MessageContainerT MessageContainerT;
00025     typedef typename MessageBufT::Map Map;
00026     typedef typename MessageBufT::MapIter MapIter;
00027 
00028     typedef typename AggregatorT::PartialType PartialT;
00029     typedef typename AggregatorT::FinalType FinalT;
00030 
00031 public:
00032     Worker()
00033     {
00034         //init_workers();//put to run.cpp
00035         message_buffer = new MessageBuffer<VertexT>;
00036         global_message_buffer = message_buffer;
00037         active_count = 0;
00038         combiner = NULL;
00039         global_combiner = NULL;
00040         aggregator = NULL;
00041         global_aggregator = NULL;
00042         global_agg = NULL;
00043     }
00044 
00045     void setCombiner(Combiner<MessageT>* cb)
00046     {
00047         combiner = cb;
00048         global_combiner = cb;
00049     }
00050 
00051     void setAggregator(AggregatorT* ag)
00052     {
00053         aggregator = ag;
00054         global_aggregator = ag;
00055         global_agg = new FinalT;
00056     }
00057 
00058     virtual ~Worker()
00059     {
00060         for (int i = 0; i < vertexes.size(); i++)
00061             delete vertexes[i];
00062         delete message_buffer;
00063         if (getAgg() != NULL)
00064             delete (FinalT*)global_agg;
00065         //worker_finalize();//put to run.cpp
00066         worker_barrier(); //newly added for ease of multi-job programming in run.cpp
00067     }
00068 
00069     //==================================
00070     //sub-functions
00071     void sync_graph()
00072     {
00073         //ResetTimer(4);
00074         //set send buffer
00075         vector<VertexContainer> _loaded_parts(_num_workers);
00076         for (int i = 0; i < vertexes.size(); i++) {
00077             VertexT* v = vertexes[i];
00078             _loaded_parts[hash(v->id)].push_back(v);
00079         }
00080         //exchange vertices to add
00081         all_to_all(_loaded_parts);
00082 
00083         //delete sent vertices
00084         for (int i = 0; i < vertexes.size(); i++) {
00085             VertexT* v = vertexes[i];
00086             if (hash(v->id) != _my_rank)
00087                 delete v;
00088         }
00089         vertexes.clear();
00090         //collect vertices to add
00091         for (int i = 0; i < _num_workers; i++) {
00092             vertexes.insert(vertexes.end(), _loaded_parts[i].begin(), _loaded_parts[i].end());
00093         }
00094         _loaded_parts.clear();
00095         //StopTimer(4);
00096         //PrintTimer("Reduce Time",4);
00097     };
00098 
00099     void active_compute()
00100     {
00101         active_count = 0;
00102         MessageBufT* mbuf = (MessageBufT*)get_message_buffer();
00103         vector<MessageContainerT>& v_msgbufs = mbuf->get_v_msg_bufs();
00104 
00105         for (int i = 0; i < vertexes.size(); i++) {
00106             if (v_msgbufs[i].size() == 0) {
00107                 if (vertexes[i]->is_active()) {
00108                     vertexes[i]->compute(v_msgbufs[i]);
00109 
00110                     AggregatorT* agg = (AggregatorT*)get_aggregator();
00111                     if (agg != NULL)
00112                         agg->stepPartial(vertexes[i]);
00113                     if (vertexes[i]->is_active())
00114                         active_count++;
00115                 }
00116             } else {
00117                 vertexes[i]->activate();
00118                 vertexes[i]->compute(v_msgbufs[i]);
00119                 v_msgbufs[i].clear(); //clear used msgs
00120 
00121                 AggregatorT* agg = (AggregatorT*)get_aggregator();
00122                 if (agg != NULL)
00123                     agg->stepPartial(vertexes[i]);
00124                 if (vertexes[i]->is_active())
00125                     active_count++;
00126             }
00127         }
00128     }
00129 
00130     void all_compute()
00131     {
00132         active_count = 0;
00133         MessageBufT* mbuf = (MessageBufT*)get_message_buffer();
00134         vector<MessageContainerT>& v_msgbufs = mbuf->get_v_msg_bufs();
00135 
00136         for (int i = 0; i < vertexes.size(); i++) {
00137             vertexes[i]->activate();
00138             vertexes[i]->compute(v_msgbufs[i]);
00139             v_msgbufs[i].clear(); //clear used msgs
00140 
00141             AggregatorT* agg = (AggregatorT*)get_aggregator();
00142             if (agg != NULL)
00143                 agg->stepPartial(vertexes[i]);
00144             if (vertexes[i]->is_active())
00145                 active_count++;
00146         }
00147     }
00148 
00149     inline void add_vertex(VertexT* vertex)
00150     {
00151 
00152         vertexes.push_back(vertex);
00153         if (vertex->is_active())
00154             active_count++;
00155     }
00156 
00157     void agg_sync()
00158     {
00159         AggregatorT* agg = (AggregatorT*)get_aggregator();
00160         if (agg != NULL) {
00161             if (_my_rank != MASTER_RANK) //send partialT to aggregator
00162             {
00163                 //gathering PartialT
00164                 PartialT* part = agg->finishPartial();
00165                 //------------------------ strategy choosing BEGIN ------------------------
00166                 StartTimer(COMMUNICATION_TIMER);
00167                 StartTimer(SERIALIZATION_TIMER);
00168                 ibinstream m;
00169                 m << part;
00170                 int sendcount = m.size();
00171                 StopTimer(SERIALIZATION_TIMER);
00172                 int total = all_sum(sendcount);
00173                 StopTimer(COMMUNICATION_TIMER);
00174                 //------------------------ strategy choosing END ------------------------
00175                 if (total <= AGGSWITCH)
00176                     slaveGather(*part);
00177                 else {
00178                     send_ibinstream(m, MASTER_RANK);
00179                 }
00180                 //scattering FinalT
00181                 slaveBcast(*((FinalT*)global_agg));
00182             } else {
00183                 //------------------------ strategy choosing BEGIN ------------------------
00184                 int total = all_sum(0);
00185                 //------------------------ strategy choosing END ------------------------
00186                 //gathering PartialT
00187                 if (total <= AGGSWITCH) {
00188                     vector<PartialT*> parts(_num_workers);
00189                     masterGather(parts);
00190                     for (int i = 0; i < _num_workers; i++) {
00191                         if (i != MASTER_RANK) {
00192                             PartialT* part = parts[i];
00193                             agg->stepFinal(part);
00194                             delete part;
00195                         }
00196                     }
00197                 } else {
00198                     for (int i = 0; i < _num_workers; i++) {
00199                         if (i != MASTER_RANK) {
00200                             obinstream um = recv_obinstream(i);
00201                             PartialT* part;
00202                             um >> part;
00203                             agg->stepFinal(part);
00204                             delete part;
00205                         }
00206                     }
00207                 }
00208                 //scattering FinalT
00209                 FinalT* final = agg->finishFinal();
00210                 //cannot set "global_agg=final" since MASTER_RANK works as a slave, and agg->finishFinal() may change
00211                 *((FinalT*)global_agg) = *final; //deep copy
00212                 masterBcast(*((FinalT*)global_agg));
00213             }
00214         }
00215     }
00216 
00217     //user-defined graphLoader ==============================
00218     virtual VertexT* toVertex(char* line) = 0; //this is what user specifies!!!!!!
00219 
00220     void load_graph(const char* inpath, hdfsFS fs)
00221     {
00222         hdfsFile in = getRHandle(inpath, fs);
00223         LineReader reader(fs, in);
00224         while (true) {
00225             reader.readLine();
00226             if (!reader.eof()) {
00227                 char* ch = reader.getLine();
00228                 VertexT* v = toVertex(ch);
00229                 //#pragma omp critical
00230                 //{
00231                 add_vertex(v);
00232                 //}
00233             } else
00234                 break;
00235         }
00236         hdfsCloseFile(fs, in);
00237     }
00238     void load_files(vector<string>& assignedSplits)
00239     {
00240         hdfsFS fs = getHdfsFS();
00241         //#pragma omp parallel for
00242         for (int i = 0; i < assignedSplits.size(); i++) {
00243             load_graph(assignedSplits[i].c_str(), fs);
00244         }
00245         hdfsDisconnect(fs);
00246     }
00247 
00248     //=======================================================
00249 
00250     //user-defined graphDumper ==============================
00251     virtual void toline(VertexT* v, BufferedWriter& writer) = 0; //this is what user specifies!!!!!!
00252 
00253     void dump_partition(const char* outpath)
00254     {
00255         hdfsFS fs = getHdfsFS();
00256         BufferedWriter* writer = new BufferedWriter(outpath, fs, _my_rank);
00257 
00258         for (VertexIter it = vertexes.begin(); it != vertexes.end(); it++) {
00259             writer->check();
00260             toline(*it, *writer);
00261         }
00262         delete writer;
00263         hdfsDisconnect(fs);
00264     }
00265     //=======================================================
00266 
00267     // run the worker
00268     void run(const WorkerParams& params)
00269     {
00270         //check path + init
00271         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00272             if (dirCheck(params.input_path.c_str(), params.output_path.c_str(), _my_rank == MASTER_RANK, params.force_write) == -1)
00273                 exit(-1);
00274         }
00275         init_timers();
00276         //dispatch splits
00277         ResetTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00278         vector<vector<string> >* arrangement;
00279         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00280             arrangement = params.native_dispatcher ? dispatchLocality(params.input_path.c_str()) : dispatchRan(params.input_path.c_str());
00281             //reportAssignment(arrangement);//DEBUG !!!!!!!!!!
00282             masterScatter(*arrangement);
00283             vector<string>& assignedSplits = (*arrangement)[0];
00284             //reading assigned splits (map)
00285             load_files(assignedSplits);
00286             delete arrangement;
00287         } else {
00288             vector<string> assignedSplits;
00289             slaveScatter(assignedSplits);
00290             //reading assigned splits (map)
00291             load_files(assignedSplits);
00292         }
00293 
00294         //send vertices according to hash_id (reduce)
00295 
00296         sync_graph();
00297 
00298         message_buffer->init(vertexes);
00299         //barrier for data loading
00300         worker_barrier(); //@@@@@@@@@@@@@
00301         StopTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00302         PrintTimer("Load Time", WORKER_TIMER);
00303 
00304         //=========================================================
00305 
00306         init_timers();
00307         ResetTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00308         //supersteps
00309         global_step_num = 0;
00310         long long step_msg_num;
00311         long long step_vadd_num;
00312         long long global_msg_num = 0;
00313         long long global_vadd_num = 0;
00314         clearBits();
00315         while (true) {
00316             global_step_num++;
00317             ResetTimer(4);
00318             //===================
00319             char bits_bor = all_bor(global_bor_bitmap);
00320             if (getBit(FORCE_TERMINATE_ORBIT, bits_bor) == 1)
00321                 break;
00322             get_vnum() = all_sum(vertexes.size());
00323             int wakeAll = getBit(WAKE_ALL_ORBIT, bits_bor);
00324             if (wakeAll == 0) {
00325                 active_vnum() = all_sum(active_count);
00326                 if (active_vnum() == 0 && getBit(HAS_MSG_ORBIT, bits_bor) == 0)
00327                     break; //all_halt AND no_msg
00328             } else
00329                 active_vnum() = get_vnum();
00330             //===================
00331             AggregatorT* agg = (AggregatorT*)get_aggregator();
00332             if (agg != NULL)
00333                 agg->init();
00334             //===================
00335             clearBits();
00336             if (wakeAll == 1)
00337                 all_compute();
00338             else
00339                 active_compute();
00340             message_buffer->combine();
00341             step_msg_num = master_sum_LL(message_buffer->get_total_msg());
00342             step_vadd_num = master_sum_LL(message_buffer->get_total_vadd());
00343             if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00344                 global_msg_num += step_msg_num;
00345                 global_vadd_num += step_vadd_num;
00346             }
00347             vector<VertexT*>& to_add = message_buffer->sync_messages();
00348             agg_sync();
00349             for (int i = 0; i < to_add.size(); i++)
00350                 add_vertex(to_add[i]);
00351             to_add.clear();
00352             //===================
00353             worker_barrier();
00354             StopTimer(4);
00355             if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00356                 cout << "Superstep " << global_step_num << " done. Time elapsed: " << get_timer(4) << " seconds" << endl;
00357                 cout << "#msgs: " << step_msg_num << ", #vadd: " << step_vadd_num << endl;
00358             }
00359         }
00360         worker_barrier();
00361         StopTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00362         PrintTimer("Communication Time", COMMUNICATION_TIMER);
00363         PrintTimer("- Serialization Time", SERIALIZATION_TIMER);
00364         PrintTimer("- Transfer Time", TRANSFER_TIMER);
00365         PrintTimer("Total Computational Time", WORKER_TIMER);
00366         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK)
00367             cout << "Total #msgs=" << global_msg_num << ", Total #vadd=" << global_vadd_num << endl;
00368 
00369         // dump graph
00370         ResetTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00371         dump_partition(params.output_path.c_str());
00372         StopTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00373         PrintTimer("Dump Time", WORKER_TIMER);
00374     }
00375 
00376     //run the worker
00377     void run(const WorkerParams& params, int num_phases)
00378     {
00379         //check path + init
00380         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00381             if (dirCheck(params.input_path.c_str(), params.output_path.c_str(), _my_rank == MASTER_RANK, params.force_write) == -1)
00382                 exit(-1);
00383         }
00384         init_timers();
00385 
00386         //dispatch splits
00387         ResetTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00388         vector<vector<string> >* arrangement;
00389         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00390             arrangement = params.native_dispatcher ? dispatchLocality(params.input_path.c_str()) : dispatchRan(params.input_path.c_str());
00391             //reportAssignment(arrangement);//DEBUG !!!!!!!!!!
00392             masterScatter(*arrangement);
00393             vector<string>& assignedSplits = (*arrangement)[0];
00394             //reading assigned splits (map)
00395             load_files(assignedSplits);
00396             delete arrangement;
00397         } else {
00398             vector<string> assignedSplits;
00399             slaveScatter(assignedSplits);
00400             //reading assigned splits (map)
00401             load_files(assignedSplits);
00402         }
00403         //send vertices according to hash_id (reduce)
00404         sync_graph();
00405         message_buffer->init(vertexes);
00406         //barrier for data loading
00407         worker_barrier(); //@@@@@@@@@@@@@
00408         StopTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00409         PrintTimer("Load Time", WORKER_TIMER);
00410 
00411         //=========================================================
00412 
00413         init_timers();
00414         ResetTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00415         bool terminate = false;
00416         for (global_phase_num = 1; global_phase_num <= num_phases; global_phase_num++) {
00417             if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK)
00418                 cout << "################ Phase " << global_phase_num << " ################" << endl;
00419 
00420             //supersteps
00421             global_step_num = 0;
00422             long long step_msg_num;
00423             long long step_vadd_num;
00424             long long global_msg_num = 0;
00425             long long global_vadd_num = 0;
00426             while (true) {
00427                 global_step_num++;
00428                 ResetTimer(4);
00429                 //===================
00430                 if (step_num() == 1) {
00431                     get_vnum() = all_sum(vertexes.size());
00432                     if (phase_num() > 1)
00433                         active_vnum() = get_vnum();
00434                     else
00435                         active_vnum() = all_sum(active_count);
00436                     //===================
00437                     AggregatorT* agg = (AggregatorT*)get_aggregator();
00438                     if (agg != NULL)
00439                         agg->init();
00440                     //===================
00441                     clearBits();
00442                     if (phase_num() > 1)
00443                         all_compute();
00444                     else
00445                         active_compute();
00446                     message_buffer->combine();
00447                     step_msg_num = master_sum_LL(message_buffer->get_total_msg());
00448                     step_vadd_num = master_sum_LL(message_buffer->get_total_vadd());
00449                     if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00450                         global_msg_num += step_msg_num;
00451                         global_vadd_num += step_vadd_num;
00452                     }
00453                     vector<VertexT*>& to_add = message_buffer->sync_messages();
00454                     agg_sync();
00455                     for (int i = 0; i < to_add.size(); i++)
00456                         add_vertex(to_add[i]);
00457                     to_add.clear();
00458                 } else {
00459                     char bits_bor = all_bor(global_bor_bitmap);
00460                     if (getBit(FORCE_TERMINATE_ORBIT, bits_bor) == 1) {
00461                         terminate = true;
00462                         break;
00463                     }
00464                     get_vnum() = all_sum(vertexes.size());
00465                     int wakeAll = getBit(WAKE_ALL_ORBIT, bits_bor);
00466                     if (wakeAll == 0) {
00467                         active_vnum() = all_sum(active_count);
00468                         if (active_vnum() == 0 && getBit(HAS_MSG_ORBIT, bits_bor) == 0)
00469                             break; //all_halt AND no_msg
00470                     } else
00471                         active_vnum() = get_vnum();
00472                     //===================
00473                     AggregatorT* agg = (AggregatorT*)get_aggregator();
00474                     if (agg != NULL)
00475                         agg->init();
00476                     //===================
00477                     clearBits();
00478                     if (wakeAll == 1)
00479                         all_compute();
00480                     else if (phase_num() > 1 && step_num() == 1)
00481                         all_compute();
00482                     else
00483                         active_compute();
00484                     message_buffer->combine();
00485                     step_msg_num = master_sum_LL(message_buffer->get_total_msg());
00486                     step_vadd_num = master_sum_LL(message_buffer->get_total_vadd());
00487                     if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00488                         global_msg_num += step_msg_num;
00489                         global_vadd_num += step_vadd_num;
00490                     }
00491                     vector<VertexT*>& to_add = message_buffer->sync_messages();
00492                     agg_sync();
00493                     for (int i = 0; i < to_add.size(); i++)
00494                         add_vertex(to_add[i]);
00495                     to_add.clear();
00496                 }
00497                 //===================
00498                 worker_barrier();
00499                 StopTimer(4);
00500                 if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00501                     cout << "Superstep " << global_step_num << " done. Time elapsed: " << get_timer(4) << " seconds" << endl;
00502                     cout << "#msgs: " << step_msg_num << ", #vadd: " << step_vadd_num << endl;
00503                 }
00504             }
00505             if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00506                 cout << "************ Phase " << global_phase_num << " done. ************" << endl;
00507                 cout << "Total #msgs=" << global_msg_num << ", Total #vadd=" << global_vadd_num << endl;
00508             }
00509             if (terminate)
00510                 break;
00511         }
00512         worker_barrier();
00513         StopTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00514         PrintTimer("Communication Time", COMMUNICATION_TIMER);
00515         PrintTimer("- Serialization Time", SERIALIZATION_TIMER);
00516         PrintTimer("- Transfer Time", TRANSFER_TIMER);
00517         PrintTimer("Total Computational Time", WORKER_TIMER);
00518 
00519         // dump graph
00520         ResetTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00521         dump_partition(params.output_path.c_str());
00522         worker_barrier();
00523         StopTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00524         PrintTimer("Dump Time", WORKER_TIMER);
00525     }
00526 
00527     // run the worker
00528     void run(const MultiInputParams& params)
00529     {
00530         //check path + init
00531         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00532             if (dirCheck(params.input_paths, params.output_path.c_str(), _my_rank == MASTER_RANK, params.force_write) == -1)
00533                 exit(-1);
00534         }
00535         init_timers();
00536 
00537         //dispatch splits
00538         ResetTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00539         vector<vector<string> >* arrangement;
00540         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00541             arrangement = params.native_dispatcher ? dispatchLocality(params.input_paths) : dispatchRan(params.input_paths);
00542             //reportAssignment(arrangement);//DEBUG !!!!!!!!!!
00543             masterScatter(*arrangement);
00544             vector<string>& assignedSplits = (*arrangement)[0];
00545             //reading assigned splits (map)
00546             for (vector<string>::iterator it = assignedSplits.begin();
00547                  it != assignedSplits.end(); it++)
00548                 load_graph(it->c_str());
00549             delete arrangement;
00550         } else {
00551             vector<string> assignedSplits;
00552             slaveScatter(assignedSplits);
00553             //reading assigned splits (map)
00554             for (vector<string>::iterator it = assignedSplits.begin();
00555                  it != assignedSplits.end(); it++)
00556                 load_graph(it->c_str());
00557         }
00558 
00559         //send vertices according to hash_id (reduce)
00560         sync_graph();
00561         message_buffer->init(vertexes);
00562         //barrier for data loading
00563         worker_barrier(); //@@@@@@@@@@@@@
00564         StopTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00565         PrintTimer("Load Time", WORKER_TIMER);
00566 
00567         //=========================================================
00568 
00569         init_timers();
00570         ResetTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00571         //supersteps
00572         global_step_num = 0;
00573         long long step_msg_num;
00574         long long step_vadd_num;
00575         long long global_msg_num = 0;
00576         long long global_vadd_num = 0;
00577         while (true) {
00578             global_step_num++;
00579             ResetTimer(4);
00580             //===================
00581             char bits_bor = all_bor(global_bor_bitmap);
00582             if (getBit(FORCE_TERMINATE_ORBIT, bits_bor) == 1)
00583                 break;
00584             get_vnum() = all_sum(vertexes.size());
00585             int wakeAll = getBit(WAKE_ALL_ORBIT, bits_bor);
00586             if (wakeAll == 0) {
00587                 active_vnum() = all_sum(active_count);
00588                 if (active_vnum() == 0 && getBit(HAS_MSG_ORBIT, bits_bor) == 0)
00589                     break; //all_halt AND no_msg
00590             } else
00591                 active_vnum() = get_vnum();
00592             //===================
00593             AggregatorT* agg = (AggregatorT*)get_aggregator();
00594             if (agg != NULL)
00595                 agg->init();
00596             //===================
00597             clearBits();
00598             if (wakeAll == 1)
00599                 all_compute();
00600             else
00601                 active_compute();
00602             message_buffer->combine();
00603             step_msg_num = master_sum_LL(message_buffer->get_total_msg());
00604             step_vadd_num = master_sum_LL(message_buffer->get_total_vadd());
00605             if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00606                 global_msg_num += step_msg_num;
00607                 global_vadd_num += step_vadd_num;
00608             }
00609             vector<VertexT*>& to_add = message_buffer->sync_messages();
00610             agg_sync();
00611             for (int i = 0; i < to_add.size(); i++)
00612                 add_vertex(to_add[i]);
00613             to_add.clear();
00614             //===================
00615             worker_barrier();
00616             StopTimer(4);
00617             if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00618                 cout << "Superstep " << global_step_num << " done. Time elapsed: " << get_timer(4) << " seconds" << endl;
00619                 cout << "#msgs: " << step_msg_num << ", #vadd: " << step_vadd_num << endl;
00620             }
00621         }
00622         worker_barrier();
00623         StopTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00624         PrintTimer("Communication Time", COMMUNICATION_TIMER);
00625         PrintTimer("- Serialization Time", SERIALIZATION_TIMER);
00626         PrintTimer("- Transfer Time", TRANSFER_TIMER);
00627         PrintTimer("Total Computational Time", WORKER_TIMER);
00628         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK)
00629             cout << "Total #msgs=" << global_msg_num << ", Total #vadd=" << global_vadd_num << endl;
00630 
00631         // dump graph
00632         ResetTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00633         dump_partition(params.output_path.c_str());
00634         worker_barrier();
00635         StopTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00636         PrintTimer("Dump Time", WORKER_TIMER);
00637     }
00638 
00639     //========================== reports machine-level msg# ===============================
00640     void run_report(const WorkerParams& params, const string reportPath)
00641     {
00642         //check path + init
00643         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00644             if (dirCheck(params.input_path.c_str(), params.output_path.c_str(), _my_rank == MASTER_RANK, params.force_write) == -1)
00645                 exit(-1);
00646         }
00647         init_timers();
00648 
00649         //dispatch splits
00650         ResetTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00651         vector<vector<string> >* arrangement;
00652         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00653             arrangement = params.native_dispatcher ? dispatchLocality(params.input_path.c_str()) : dispatchRan(params.input_path.c_str());
00654             //reportAssignment(arrangement);//DEBUG !!!!!!!!!!
00655             masterScatter(*arrangement);
00656             vector<string>& assignedSplits = (*arrangement)[0];
00657             //reading assigned splits (map)
00658             for (vector<string>::iterator it = assignedSplits.begin();
00659                  it != assignedSplits.end(); it++)
00660                 load_graph(it->c_str());
00661             delete arrangement;
00662         } else {
00663             vector<string> assignedSplits;
00664             slaveScatter(assignedSplits);
00665             //reading assigned splits (map)
00666             for (vector<string>::iterator it = assignedSplits.begin();
00667                  it != assignedSplits.end(); it++)
00668                 load_graph(it->c_str());
00669         }
00670 
00671         //send vertices according to hash_id (reduce)
00672         sync_graph();
00673         message_buffer->init(vertexes);
00674         //barrier for data loading
00675         worker_barrier(); //@@@@@@@@@@@@@
00676         StopTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00677         PrintTimer("Load Time", WORKER_TIMER);
00678 
00679         //=========================================================
00680         vector<long long> msgNumVec; //$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$ added for per-worker msg counting
00681 
00682         init_timers();
00683         ResetTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00684         //supersteps
00685         global_step_num = 0;
00686         long long step_msg_num;
00687         long long step_vadd_num;
00688         long long global_msg_num = 0;
00689         long long global_vadd_num = 0;
00690         while (true) {
00691             global_step_num++;
00692             ResetTimer(4);
00693             //===================
00694             char bits_bor = all_bor(global_bor_bitmap);
00695             if (getBit(FORCE_TERMINATE_ORBIT, bits_bor) == 1)
00696                 break;
00697             get_vnum() = all_sum(vertexes.size());
00698             int wakeAll = getBit(WAKE_ALL_ORBIT, bits_bor);
00699             if (wakeAll == 0) {
00700                 active_vnum() = all_sum(active_count);
00701                 if (active_vnum() == 0 && getBit(HAS_MSG_ORBIT, bits_bor) == 0)
00702                     break; //all_halt AND no_msg
00703             } else
00704                 active_vnum() = get_vnum();
00705             //===================
00706             AggregatorT* agg = (AggregatorT*)get_aggregator();
00707             if (agg != NULL)
00708                 agg->init();
00709             //===================
00710             clearBits();
00711             if (wakeAll == 1)
00712                 all_compute();
00713             else
00714                 active_compute();
00715             message_buffer->combine();
00716             long long my_msg_num = message_buffer->get_total_msg(); //$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$ added for per-worker msg counting
00717             msgNumVec.push_back(my_msg_num); //$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$ added for per-worker msg counting
00718             step_msg_num = master_sum_LL(my_msg_num); //$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$ added for per-worker msg counting
00719             step_vadd_num = master_sum_LL(message_buffer->get_total_vadd());
00720             if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00721                 global_msg_num += step_msg_num;
00722                 global_vadd_num += step_vadd_num;
00723             }
00724             vector<VertexT*>& to_add = message_buffer->sync_messages();
00725             agg_sync();
00726             for (int i = 0; i < to_add.size(); i++)
00727                 add_vertex(to_add[i]);
00728             to_add.clear();
00729             //===================
00730             worker_barrier();
00731             StopTimer(4);
00732             if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK) {
00733                 cout << "Superstep " << global_step_num << " done. Time elapsed: " << get_timer(4) << " seconds" << endl;
00734                 cout << "#msgs: " << step_msg_num << ", #vadd: " << step_vadd_num << endl;
00735             }
00736         }
00737         worker_barrier();
00738         StopTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00739         PrintTimer("Communication Time", COMMUNICATION_TIMER);
00740         PrintTimer("- Serialization Time", SERIALIZATION_TIMER);
00741         PrintTimer("- Transfer Time", TRANSFER_TIMER);
00742         PrintTimer("Total Computational Time", WORKER_TIMER);
00743         if (_my_rank == MASTER_RANK)
00744             cout << "Total #msgs=" << global_msg_num << ", Total #vadd=" << global_vadd_num << endl;
00745 
00746         // dump graph
00747         ResetTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00748         dump_partition(params.output_path.c_str());
00749 
00750         StopTimer(WORKER_TIMER);
00751         PrintTimer("Dump Time", WORKER_TIMER);
00752 
00753         //dump report
00754         if (_my_rank != MASTER_RANK) {
00755             slaveGather(msgNumVec);
00756         } else {
00757             vector<vector<long long> > report(_num_workers);
00758             masterGather(report);
00759             report[MASTER_RANK].swap(msgNumVec);
00760             //////
00761             //per line per worker: #msg for step1, #msg for step2, ...
00762             hdfsFS fs = getHdfsFS();
00763             hdfsFile out = getWHandle(reportPath.c_str(), fs);
00764             char buffer[100];
00765             for (int i = 0; i < _num_workers; i++) {
00766                 for (int j = 0; j < report[i].size(); j++) {
00767                     sprintf(buffer, "%lld ", report[i][j]);
00768                     hdfsWrite(fs, out, (void*)buffer, strlen(buffer));
00769                 }
00770                 sprintf(buffer, "\n");
00771                 hdfsWrite(fs, out, (void*)buffer, strlen(buffer));
00772             }
00773             if (hdfsFlush(fs, out)) {
00774                 fprintf(stderr, "Failed to 'flush' %s\n", reportPath.c_str());
00775                 exit(-1);
00776             }
00777             hdfsCloseFile(fs, out);
00778             hdfsDisconnect(fs);
00779         }
00780     }
00781 
00782 private:
00783     HashT hash;
00784     VertexContainer vertexes;
00785     int active_count;
00786 
00787     MessageBuffer<VertexT>* message_buffer;
00788     Combiner<MessageT>* combiner;
00789     AggregatorT* aggregator;
00790 };
00791 
00792 #endif
